Description: Complete lifecycle management of internet technology and web3 blockchain products, from market research and analysis, conceptual planning, product design to development and launch.2. Conduct requirements analysis, prototype design, requirements design, development advancement, and product iteration.3. Plan the front-end and back-end modules of the product, product functionality, interactive interface, and flowchart design.4. Coordinate with development, testing, operations, design, and project resources to ensure product launches as planned and be responsible for the final product outcome.5. Monitor the operation of live products, compile user feedback, periodically analyze competitors' movements, and improve the product based on data analysis. Complete regular product iterations.7. Assist with other product-related tasks.Skills
Skills: 1. Fluent in both Chinese and English, communication with overseas partners is required.
2. Prior experience in blockchain, internet technology, and digital marketing is preferred.

4. Good communication skills, a high sense of responsibility, a spirit of teamwork to overcome challenges, strategic thinking, determination and perseverance to grow together; innovate and create, independent thinking, and eagerness to grow.
